Product1 Description2: Reduction of PLC program writing costs.
Product1 Description3: Improving the quality of the PLC program.
Product1 Description4: Improving the logic within the standard.
Product1 Description5: Better and more convenient form of programming.
Product1 Description6: Avoiding the often tedious process of copying and pasting. And related bugs.
Product1 Description7: Facilitating the management of the program languages (generating web titles and other texts for the selected language).
Product1 Description8: Automatic check of Eplan tag errors when importing them from an "SDF" file.
Product1 Description9: Facilitation of the programming process (reduction of required offline competencies).
Product1 Description10: Better management of know-how for a specific technology within the standard.
